creditline:
The William M. Ladd Collection
Gift of Herschel V. Jones, 1916
inscription:
Signed in pencil in lower margin < Joseph Pennell >
Etched in plate at L. Left < At Chestnut St. Bridge Pennell 1880)
Also etched in notice affixed to marble slab at C.R. < Jo Pennel >
Etched on marble slab at C.R. is < .....Jan 29 1881 >  (in reverse)
signed: on sheet, etched in plate at l.r.
title: (At) Chestnut Street Bridge (Marble Yard)
